translated: The mandala of the special one who goes to the realm of the gods,

original: mtshungs med pas kyang mtshungs med mthu rtsal mnga'//
analyzed: mtshungs med pas kyang mtshungs med mthu rtsal mnga'//
translated: Having power and strength unmatched by the unequaled,

original: stabs gshegs yon tan mche mchog 'od zer ldan //
analyzed: stabs gshegs yon tan mche mchog 'od zer ldan //
translated: Walking with the gait of a great elephant, endowed with the light of supreme qualities,

original: 'jig rten nang na mkhas pa spyan ras gzigs //
analyzed: 'jig rten nang na mkhas pa spyan ras gzigs //
translated: The wise Avalokite≈õvara in the world,

original: sa gzhi'i dkyil 'khor dbus kyi dkyil 'khor can //
analyzed: sa gzhi'i dkyil 'khor dbus kyi dkyil 'khor can //
translated: Having the mandala in the center of the earth's mandala,

original: 'od zer mang po stong phrag zad mi shes //
analyzed: 'od zer mang po stong phrag zad mi shes //
translated: With countless thousands of light rays.

original: @65a *// nyon mongs rdul rnams thams cad sel mdzad pa //
analyzed: @65a *// nyon mongs rdul rnams thams cad sel mdzad pa //
translated: You clear away all the dust of afflictions.

original: mtha' dang bral ba kun tu gzigs pa ste /
analyzed: mtha' dang bral ba kun tu gzigs pa ste /
translated: You see everywhere, free from extremes.

original: rab zhi kun las 'phags pa'i spyod yul can //
analyzed: rab zhi kun las 'phags pa'i spyod yul can //
translated: Your domain is completely exalted above all peace.

original: don dam tshul la sems can gcig dpa' ba //
analyzed: don dam tshul la sems can gcig dpa' ba //
translated: You are the hero for sentient beings in the way of the ultimate.

original: theg pa bzang po 'dzin pa'i nyi ma lags //
analyzed: theg pa bzang po 'dzin pa'i nyi ma lags //
translated: You are the sun that holds the good vehicle.

original: dul dang spyan dang tshul la dad pa bsnyes //
analyzed: dul dang spyan dang tshul la dad pa bsnyes //
translated: You are filled with faith in discipline, eyes, and conduct.üîΩYou have completely destroyed all the stains of the sour fruit.

original: skyu rgu rnams kyi dri ma ma lus bcom blo gros bzang po rab dgyes ston pa po /
analyzed: skyu rgu rnams kyi dri ma ma lus bcom blo gros bzang po rab dgyes ston pa po /
translated: You are the one who shows the excellent mind of good joy.

original: bde ldan gos rgyan yang ba sna tshogs can /
analyzed: bde ldan gos rgyan yang ba sna tshogs can /
translated: You are the one who has the various light garments and ornaments.

original: bcom ldan 'byung ba 'jigs pa med par mdzad //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'byung ba 'jigs pa med par mdzad //
translated: You are the BhagavƒÅn who makes the elements arise without fear.

original: rtag tu dge ba kun mchog sbyin pa po //
analyzed: rtag tu dge ba kun mchog sbyin pa po //
translated: You are the one who always gives the supreme of all that is good.

original: rgyal bas gsungs pa'i rnam thar brnyes pa'i blo //
analyzed: rgyal bas gsungs pa'i rnam thar brnyes pa'i blo //
translated: You are the one who has the mind that has attained the liberation taught by the Jina.

original: bde la longs spyod che 'byung dri ma med //
analyzed: bde la longs spyod che 'byung dri ma med //
translated: You are the one who has the great arising of stainless enjoyment of bliss.

original: zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas shing dri med pa //
analyzed: zhal gyi dkyil 'khor rgyas shing dri med pa //
translated: You are the one with the stainless, vast circle of a face.

original: ming dang sred med brgya byin lag pa'i mchog //
analyzed: ming dang sred med brgya byin lag pa'i mchog //
translated: You are the one with the name of NƒÅrƒÅya·πáa, the best of ≈öakra‚Äôs arms.

original: 'jig rten mang po gzigs pa'i dbang phyug go //
analyzed: 'jig rten mang po gzigs pa'i dbang phyug go //
translated: You are the lord who sees many worlds.

original: stobs dang rigs dang mthu stobs che ba lags //
analyzed: stobs dang rigs dang mthu stobs che ba lags //
translated: You have great power, lineage, and strength.

original: sangs rgyas mtshungs shing chos mchog rin chen mtshungs //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mtshungs shing chos mchog rin chen mtshungs //
translated: You are equal to the Buddha, equal to the supreme jewel of the Dharma,

original: dge 'dun mtshungs shing chags bral thub par dka'//
analyzed: dge 'dun mtshungs shing chags bral thub par dka'//

original: khyab bdag nyon mongs rnam gsum rdul bsal ba'i //
analyzed: khyab bdag nyon mongs rnam gsum rdul bsal ba'i //

original: rdo rje sems mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: rdo rje sems mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Supreme Vajrasattva, I pay homage to you.

original: @65b padma dri med phyag gi dbus bsnams pa //
analyzed: @65b padma dri med phyag gi dbus bsnams pa //
translated: Holding a stainless lotus in the center of your hand,

original: thor tshugs can la gzugs ldan cod pan thogs //
analyzed: thor tshugs can la gzugs ldan cod pan thogs //

original: spyi bo 'od dpag med rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: spyi bo 'od dpag med rgyas khyod phyag 'tshal //
translated: Your head is filled with AmitƒÅbha, I pay homage to you.

original: de nas bcom ldan rang byung mun sel ba //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan rang byung mun sel ba //
translated: Then the Blessed One, the self-arisen remover of darkness,

original: rnga chen sgra ltar brtan pas bka' stsal pa //
analyzed: rnga chen sgra ltar brtan pas bka' stsal pa //
translated: With a voice as stable as the sound of a great drum,

analyzed: mchog chen rdo rje'i glu la bstod pa yi //

analyzed: ming brgya rtsa brgyad skyon sel legs pa mnga'//

original: ci ste la la rtag tu dge mchog 'dod //
analyzed: ci ste la la rtag tu dge mchog 'dod //

analyzed: spyan ras gzigs dbang la ni bstod byed pa // des ni ring po mi thogs yon tan gyi //

original: mi ni gang zhig rtag tu 'dis bstod la //
analyzed: mi ni gang zhig rtag tu 'dis bstod la //
translated: Whoever always praises this
